{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|口|勿|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}}.

===Etymology===
{{unk.|lang=zh}}. Various possibilities are ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}):
* Related to {{och-l|門|door}};
* Related to {{cog|lus|hmûi||lips; upper lip}};
* Related to {{cog|mkh-vie-pro|*c-ɓuːj(ʔ)||lip}} ({{cog|vi|môi}});
* Related to {{cog|my|မုတ်||mouth}} (in {{m|my|မုတ်ဆိတ်||beard}}) and {{m|my|မှုတ်||to blow with mouth}};
* Related to {{cog|km|មាត់||mouth, lip}}.
